channel.title: Tutorials on MongoDB Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on MongoDB Tools

item.title: QuickStart
item.description: Welcome to the QuickStart guide. In this guide we are going to cover how to use the tool to extract a schema from a MongoDB database and review then apply the validation schema to MongoDB. We are going to follow the following steps in the tutorial. Preload some dummy data into a running MongoDB instance. Run the tool against MongoDB to extract the Schema of the collections. Apply the Schemas to the existing collections.
